short_bio: I'm Chef Kim Chul-Soo who studied in France for 10 years.

recipes.name: Kimchi Stew
recipes.description: A traditional Korean stew made with kimchi.
directions: 1. Boil water in a pot.
2. Add kimchi and pork and boil for 10 minutes.
3. Add tofu and boil for another 5 minutes.

recipes.name: Bulgogi
recipes.description: One of the most representative meat dishes in Korea.
directions: 1. Marinate sliced beef in a mixture of soy sauce, sugar, and minced garlic.
2. Stir-fry marinated beef with sliced onion.
3. Add gochujang and stir-fry for a few more minutes.

recipes.name: Japchae
recipes.description: A Korean stir-fried noodle dish with vegetables.
directions: 1. Boil sweet potato noodles in water until soft.
2. Stir-fry sliced beef with sliced vegetables.
3. Mix cooked noodles and stir-fried vegetables together and add soy sauce and sesame oil.

short_bio: I'm Chef Jung-Hwa Kim, and I specialize in traditional Korean dishes made with locally sourced ingredients.

recipes.name: Galbi-jjim
recipes.description: A Korean braised short ribs dish.
directions: 1. Marinate short ribs in a mixture of soy sauce, sugar, rice wine, and minced garlic and ginger for at least 1 hour.
2. Sauté sliced onion in a pot.
3. Add the marinated short ribs, chestnuts, and water.
4. Cook over low heat for about 2 hours until the meat is tender and the sauce is thickened.

recipes.name: Kimchi Fried Rice
recipes.description: A quick and easy Korean fried rice dish made with kimchi.
directions: 1. Sauté chopped bacon in a pan.
2. Add chopped kimchi and cooked rice to the pan and stir-fry for a few minutes.
3. Push the fried rice to one side of the pan and scramble an egg on the other side.
4. Mix everything together and add soy sauce, sesame oil, and sliced green onion.

recipes.name: Dak-galbi
recipes.description: A spicy Korean chicken dish made with gochujang and vegetables.
directions: 1. Marinate sliced chicken breast in a mixture of gochujang, soy sauce, sugar, and minced garlic for at least 30 minutes.
2. Stir-fry marinated chicken with sliced cabbage, sweet potato, and onion.
3. Add sliced rice cake and stir-fry for a few more minutes until everything is cooked through.

short_bio: Kim Min-ji is a Korean chef who has been trained in both traditional and modern Korean cuisine.

recipes.name: Bibimbap
recipes.description: A Korean dish of mixed rice with vegetables, meat, and egg, served with spicy gochujang sauce.
directions: 1. Cook rice and set aside.
2. Saute beef with garlic and soy sauce until cooked through.
3. Blanch spinach, bean sprouts, carrots, and zucchini in boiling water.
4. Fry an egg sunny-side up.
5. Arrange the cooked ingredients on top of the rice in a bowl.
6. Serve with gochujang sauce on the side.

recipes.name: Japchae
recipes.description: A Korean noodle dish made with sweet potato starch noodles, vegetables, and beef.
directions: 1. Cook noodles in boiling water until tender.
2. Saute beef with garlic, soy sauce, and sesame oil until cooked through.
3. Saute spinach, carrots, onion, and mushrooms until tender.
4. Mix cooked noodles, beef, and vegetables together.
5. Serve hot or cold.

recipes.name: Kimchi Fried Rice
recipes.description: A Korean dish of fried rice with kimchi, vegetables, and egg.
directions: 1. Cook rice and set aside.
2. Saute kimchi, carrots, onion, and garlic in a pan.
3. Add rice and stir-fry until heated through.
4. Push rice to one side of the pan and crack an egg on the other side.
5. Scramble the egg and mix with the rice.
6. Garnish with chopped green onions and serve.

short_bio: I'm Chef Ji-hye Kim who studied in France for 8 years.
